eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Missouri; at 12:52 PM ON JAN 12, 2026 Effective until 01:52 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THIS IS A CANCELLATION OF AN AMBER ALERT THAT WAS ISSUED BY JEFFERSON CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT ON 01/12/2026 AT 12:00 PM.  

ABDUCTED WAS SABA AKBARI, FEMALE, AGE 12. 
ABDUCTED WAS HAJARN AKBARI, MALE, AGE 1. 

THE CHILDREN HAVE BEEN LOCATED SAFE.  THE VEHICLE WAS LOCATED AND THE SUSPECT IS IN CUSTODY.  TROOP F
